item.title: 317 Delta dialogue
item.dc:creator: @bebew70 bebew70
item.description:
@bebew70 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:477843”][quote author=bebew70 link=topic=596039.msg4196558#msg4196558 date=1357585195]

I added some dialogue to an npc i spawned and when i press continue it seems to stay at “please wait…” anyone know how to fix this?

[code]if(c.NPCID == 945) {
c.NpcDialogue = 1;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
c.RemoveAllWindows();

		}[/code]

snip

c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
You set it to false… Meaning the packet doesn’t get sent. The interface don’t change.

it is set to false though and it does not want to work.
[/quote]
SET IT TO TRUE JESUS CHRIST[/quote]

Am i missing something? He does not talk at all now is there something else i should change?

Read full topic
